channel.title: The Global And Modular BSM Inference Tool on

item.title: License
item.description: The BSD license below applies to all source files in the GAMBIT distribution, except for those contained in the contrib/fjcore-3.1.3, contrib/MassSpectra and contrib/multimin directories. The files in those directories belong to the FastJet, FlexibleSUSY/SOFTSUSY and multimin projects respectively, and are distributed under the GNU General Public License, with special exception (granted by the authors of these packages to GAMBIT) that their inclusion in GAMBIT does not require that the rest of GAMBIT be distributed under the GPL.
